Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People in Australia are buzzing about the upcoming overhaul of the Reserve Bank which has come under fire for its operations and practices. Federal Treasurer Jim Chalmers is expected to release the details of the first review into the bank which has prompted the discussion of 51 recommendations for change. Meanwhile calls are growing louder for the government to increase the JobSeeker rate from $44 to $80 a day to help Australians live with dignity.
